author: mmarionncern
body:
Similar as https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5417 (designed for 73X) for 72X, asked by offline people.

Replaces https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/5416 which was conflicting due to necessary changes for 73X.
title: 72X TMatrix and TVector replacement with SMatrix and SVector in default MET code
